reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater to be of great quality with a perfect fit, soft fabric, and a look that feels expensive.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Woman women's mock turtle neck sweaters
items.body: I ordered four of these sweaters, in khaki, plum, red and navy blue. I want to wear them for the upcoming holidays and as the weather gets cooler. I'm starting with three stars for all of them and hopefully will be able to increase that rating. My complaint is that the way they were packaged and sent was horrible. Vacuum sealed in tiny packages so at present, I have them popped in the dryer with a wet washcloth and a couple of fabric sheets in hopes to release those countless wrinkles due to sealing and packing. They appear to be lovely sweaters, I think the colors are spot on and are beautiful. There was no odor, thankfully, but oh, those wrinkles!! Such pretty garments to just throw in a bag is terrible. They are soft, the weight is about a medium weight, not too heavy, not too light, a Goldilocks weight-just right. I would say the quality is above most, which is why the wrinkles are baffling. The cost was phenomenal and I could not beat that price point anywhere. They almost have a cashmere feel... almost. They look small, but I ordered an XL because I don't like tight fitted sweaters. Again once I hang them on hangers if the wrinkles dissapate, I'll be able to tell better, but I think they'll be fine. Really beautiful sweaters, terrible packing. Fingers crossed they will be as advertised ( and will look as advertised as well. ) Update to follow. Update: the damp cloth and 20 minutes on a low setting in the dryer did the trick. These turned out beautifully and I would definitely recommend. Increasing to a five star rating! These now feel softer, they don't seem to feel as heavy and are really pretty sweaters. Read more
items.author: Vera Hensley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, Soft, True Fit
items.body: Beautiful, soft, nice quality, and perfect fit. I’ll buy more in other colors Read more
items.author: Caribbean_Kim

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Go up a size as it fits tight in the chest.
items.body: This is really a nice weight sweater. Not see-through at all. I love the color and the fit. However I did size up a size. I normally wear a large for my bust- 40” (5’5” 155lbs.) I went up to an XL fl and it fit perfect. Sleeves are a nice length. The only reason I gave it four stars is the neck does not stretch at all over your head. Almost has a thread running through it to keep it from opening further so it is a snug pull over the head. But it does fit very nice once it’s on. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft as Cashmere
items.body: I was looking for something warm but lightweight and this sweater is perfect! It is super soft, deep black color and a nice quality. It is classic styling, comfortable under a blazer or a coat. Read more
items.author: Lady Carlene

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality Mock Turtle Neck
items.body: GREAT Quality and Fit. I love this mock turtleneck. I wear size medium and it fits true to size. Fabric is soft and the neck is not tight or too high. Sleeves are perfect and length is nice comes just below hips but could be tucked under some as well. Pairing this with a black skirt and black suede boots both from Amazon. Wearing gold pendant necklace and gold bracelets. Also bought a gold chain belt from Amazon to break up the black however it looks great without the belt as well. Read more
items.author: Debra

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Purchase
items.body: I love this top! The material is soft. It wears comfortably. And it's warm. The color looks like the picture. I'm going to order more in other colors. Read more
items.author: JUANITA E ARULDOSS

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy
items.body: The only thing I can say hood about this top is the beautiful yellow color. The fabric is not sweater fabric. It’ is a really odd fabric. Not attractive in the least. Aside from the fabric the mock neck does not even show from the rest of the top. I am saying top because it cannot be called a sweater. I am returning it. Read more
items.author: Cindy Leroy

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as pictured, very soft
items.body: The photo is not the actual product. The mock neck looks solid and half way up the neck. What I got barely covers the collarbone, and it’s floppy and uneven. I would send it back but it is by far the softest sweater (it’s lightweight) I’ve ever had. It’s teddy bear soft so I will overlook the wonky neck and definitely wear this. Others said the fabric is bad. They are very obviously not using the same fabric for all tops. I got black, it is great quality fabric and super soft. Not thin at all. Read more
items.author: A. Fink

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Coffee, Olive Green, Light Apricot, Black, Coffee, Orange, Plum, Mustard Yellow, Teal, Fruit Green, Grey, Sage Green, Navy Blue, Gray Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
